title: Sudan Affirms Full Cooperation With UN Security Council Expert Team On Darfur
desc: Port Sudan, 3 January 2026 (SUNA) - The government of Sudan reaffirmed its commitment to full cooperation with the UN Security Council's sanctions expert team tasked with Resolution 1591 concerning the Darfur region, the Director of the Peace and Humanitarian Affairs Directorate at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, Ambassador Jaafar Soumi Toto, stated.
